basics.name: Matt Berther
basics.label: Director, Software Engineering
basics.summary: Matt hails from Boise by way of Truckee, CA. He has been working in health information technology for 15 years. His work focuses leading and building successful software development teams. He has a strong passion for technology and lifelong learning. Though his work focuses on building successful teams, when Matt is not at work, he prefers the solitude of fishing a mountain stream.

work.summary: Healthwise is a content and technology organtization that endeavors to deliver health information that people use to make better health decisions - at the moment that they need that information.
highlights: Created a culture of software craftsmanship
Led cloud migration strategy resulting in 99.99% uptime SLA
Guided team towards more frequent deployments that helped clients realize new functionality sooner
Built partnership with near-shore firm to augment development capacity
